name: Z Room
description:
Z Room is a 3D Zombie shooter game, designed to play on your Watch or Phone.

Play 3 game modes

◉ AR
Play in the real world with full sized Zombies on your Phone. With the new Augmented Reality mode you can get in the middle of the action. Every round Zombies will come at you from any direction. Keep looking around so they don't get the drop on you.

◉ Stand
Stand your ground as hordes of Zombies come at you. You're armed with only your trusty hand gun and unlimited bullets. Every round the zombies get quicker so take them down quick. Zoom in to get a headshot for maximum damage.

◉ Survive
How long can you survive the Z Room? You start armed with just 10 bullets and 10% health. Kill the Zombies and search the room for weapons, ammo and health. Random Zombies and items re-spawn so keep moving. How many Zombies will you kill before they get you?
